title: cannot upload file larger than 50% of remaining disk space
body:
**expected results**
ability to upload file

**actual results**
error stating not enough disk space

**steps**
upload file to owncloud server via web browser whose size is more than 1/2 the available space 
the upload fails due to lack of free space.

however, the upload arrow states there is enough room for the file.  the personal tab says there is enough space.

i would suspect when the upload is complete, a copy of the file is performed and there is not enough room for 2 versions of the "large" file so it fails.  the copy should be a move.

in addition, the error message doesn't appear until the file is completely uploaded.  in this test instance, i was uploading a 3gb file, which takes quite some time, and i had to wait until the end for the error message to apper telling me the upload failed.  

note: this is not an issue with the quota -- it is an issue with total disk space remaining on the server.
